question: Abhiyan Indradhanush, sometimes seen in the news, is associated with which of the following?
option1: It aims to immunize all children under the age of 2 years, as well as all pregnant women, against preventable diseases.
option2: It is a revival plan for public sector banks by infusing capital in banks.
option3: It is an initiative to make ESIC hospitals clean and hygienic.
option4: It aims to provide every village in the country with a trained female health activist.
answer: It is an initiative to make ESIC hospitals clean and hygienic.
explanation: It is an initiative to make ESIC hospitals become more vibrant, clean and hygienic. As per the Abhiyan Indradhanush, the hospital beds will have to be a clean sheet of a specified colour as per VIBGYOR pattern on regular days. The initiative aims to bring awareness towards cleanliness. As per VIBGYOR pattern, the days and colours of bed sheets will be as follows- Sunday- Violet, Monday-Indigo, Tuesday-Blue, Wednesday-Green, Thursday-Yellow, Friday-Orange and Saturday- Red.
